alert.note: Alert for Benton (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 4:26PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Benton County through 500 PM CDT... At 426 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sauk Rapids, or 8 miles northeast of St. Cloud, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Benton County, including the following locations... Mayhew and Gilman. This includes U.S. Highway 10 in Minnesota between mile markers 167 and 175. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
